alert.note: Alert for Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 1:58PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 245 PM MST... At 157 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Hilltop, or 20 miles northeast of Globe, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sawmill and Hilltop. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 266 and 287. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
